name: Slugs Versus Salt
description:
Unfinished Sharks and Minnows type of game (multiplayer)

Salt = Shark
Minos = Slugs

To become salt. die to a salt (first one is straight above, since I couldn't figure out how to start someone as salt in 48 hours).
Collect grapes to increase you score!

CURRENT BUGS:

Only host can become the initial salt. If a joining player intentionally becomes salt, their game will freeze. They CAN however be touched by the host to become a new salt and that works fine. (some weird desync btwn client and host where client thinks they died, but host doesnt, so they're both salt and slug...)

GGJ Page: https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/slugs-versus-salt-4
